toyota-corolla.reviewText: Great car, very reliable and fuel-efficient!

honda-civic.reviewText: Sporty and efficient; a joy to drive.
Loved the handling and fuel efficiency.

ford-mustang.reviewText: A powerful muscle car with a modern touch.
Amazing acceleration and design, truly iconic.

bmw-3-series.reviewText: Luxurious and sporty with precise handling.
Well-balanced performance with a premium feel.

honda-accord.reviewText: Spacious, comfortable, and reliable for daily commutes.
Smooth ride and excellent safety features.
Perfect blend of performance and comfort.

mercedes-g-class.reviewText: Luxurious and rugged, perfect for any terrain.
A high-end SUV that stands out on the road.
Outstanding off-road capabilities and refined design.

audi-a5-cabriolet.reviewText: A fun and stylish convertible, great for summer drives.
Smooth open-air driving experience with a sporty edge.

tesla-model-3.reviewText: Innovative and eco-friendly with outstanding acceleration.
A glimpse into the future of automotive technology.
Took way too long to charge
